contentrichtext.text: {{Politics of the Netherlands}} '''General elections''' were held in the [[Netherlands]] on 15 June 1897.<ref name=NS>[[Dieter Nohlen|Nohlen, D]] & Stöver, P (2010) ''Elections in Europe: A data handbook'', p1395 ISBN 978-3-8329-5609-7</ref> The [[Liberal Union (Netherlands)|Liberal Democratic League]] remained the largest party, winning 48 of the 100 seats in the [[House of Representatives of the Netherlands|House of Representatives]].<ref>Nohlen & Stöver, p1412</ref> ==Results== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Party !Votes !% !Seats !+/– |- |align=left|[[Liberal Union (Netherlands)|Liberal Democratic League]]||126,199||30.5||48||–9 |- |align=left|[[Anti Revolutionary Party]]||108,581||26.2||17||+2 |- |align=left|[[General League of Roman Catholic Caucuses]]||83,826||20.3||22||–3 |- |align=left|Christian Historicals||44,159||10.7||6||+6 |- |align=left|[[Radical League]]||14,863||3.6||4||+1 |- |align=left|[[Social Democratic Workers' Party (Netherlands)|Social Democratic Workers' Party]]||12,312||3.0||3||+3 |- |align=left|Other parties||23,774||5.7||0||0 |- |align=left|Invalid/blank votes|| ||–||–||– |- |align=left|'''Total'''||'''413,714'''||'''100'''||'''100'''||'''0''' |- |align=left|Registered voters/turnout||576,598|| ||–||– |- |align=left colspan=5|Source: Nohlen & Stöver |} ==References== {{reflist}} {{Dutch general elections}} [[Category:General elections in the Netherlands|1897]] [[Category:1897 elections in Europe]] [[Category:1897 in the Netherlands]]
